attributes.action: reject an 'opt out' system for organ donation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those people who are willing to donate organs are already able to do so. Those who have moral or religious objections to organ donation should not have to defend their right to remain intact at death. Humans are not interchangeable pieces of 'meat' and to force an 'opt out' situation devalues us all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
